name: Flame Sword Fireshifter
text: You can discard this card, add 1 "Salamandra" card from your deck or GY to your hand; add 1 "Fire Forge Fusion". If this card is in your GY and "Salamandra" is sent to the GY: banish this card; add 1 "Salamandra" from your GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Flame Sword Fireshifter" once per turn.
